remarks: Transfer lattice join with atom to subspace sum.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Apr-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dihjat5.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihjat5.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihjat5.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
dihjat5.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dihjat5.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihjat5.s $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` U ) $.
dihjat5.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihjat5.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dihjat5.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
dihjat5.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. A ) $.
dihjat5N $p |- ( ph -> ( X .\/ P ) = ( `' I ` ( ( I ` X ) .(+) ( I ` P ) ) ) ) $.
